"Sky Park Arkuma Land":
"Hello, all you ARKS. I am Arkuma.
I have prepared a fun training program
for you. The objective is simple.
Defeat as many enemies as you can
within a time limit and set a high score.
You will need to complete Emergency
Trials if you want to earn a high score.
Be aggressive as you proceed.
――――――――――――――――――――
Score is shared within the room.
Quest ends when time limit expires."

"Thank you all for coming. This mission
is a score attack where you do better
the more enemies you defeat."

"As a little bonus, I've set up Trial
Orders for the Emergency Trials
that occur during the quest."

"If you can complete them, the
points you earn afterwards will
be worth that much more. I want
to see you all going for a high score."
"Starting quest. Defeat the enemies and aim for a high score!"
"Notice: Half time remaining. Try to complete Trial Orders to increase points and get a high score."
"Notice: One minute left. Until the time is out, keep working hard."
